t: Amazon quietly launches exclusive OTC product line: 7 things to know
s: 7. An Amazon spokesperson told CNBC that Basic Care will not give the company a pathway to sell prescription drugs. However, the e-commerce giant has expressed interest in entering the prescription drug space throughout the past few months.

t: Amazon has quietly launched an exclusive line of over-the-counter health products
s: February 22, 2018 - Amazon sells branded over-the-counter medications such as Advil, Mucinex and Nicorette as well as options from Perrigo's generic GoodSense brand. Basic Care, Amazon's recently launched exclusive line of Perrigo OTC health products, is a possible challenge to pharmacy retail chains.

t: Will Amazon's Basic Care OTC Line Disrupt the Market?
s: March 5, 2021 - The online retailing giant has its own brand of nonprescription drugs. Can it compete? Without much fanfare, Amazon recently launched a line of generic OTC medications called Basic Care.1 This line will compete with Giant Eagle's TopCare, Target's Up & Up, and Walmart's Equate brands.
